channel.title: When i run a PI client i always get this damn error thing. look
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
thats the error i get, for some reason it worked on my windows XP computer but not this windows vista one?
Run.bat [code]@echo off title Private Server Client color 1f "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx300m -cp . Gui 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: When i run a PI client i always get this damn error thing. look

item.description:
@F2P_Beta wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

thats the error i get, for some reason it worked on my windows XP computer but not this windows vista one?

Run.bat

@echo off title Private Server Client color 1f "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java" -Xmx300m -cp . Gui 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
